org.springframework.boot.actuate.metrics.writer

Interface MetricWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CounterWriter, GaugeWriter
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MetricRepository, RichGaugeRepository
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeMetricWriter, InMemoryMetricRepository, InMemoryRichGaugeRepository, JmxMetricWriter, MessageChannelMetricWriter, RedisMetricRepository, StatsdMetricWriter

    public interface MetricWriter
extends GaugeWriter, CounterWriter
    Basic strategy for write operations on Metric data.
    Author:
    Dave Syer
    See Also:
    GaugeWriter, CounterWriter
